## Request Type
Please check the relevant option:

- [ ] Website feature/improvement
- [ ] UI/UX enhancement
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Documentation improvement
- [ ] Project structure change
- [ ] Other (please specify below)

## Description
A clear and detailed description of your request or suggestion.

## Motivation
Why is this request needed? What problem does it solve or what value does it add?

## Proposed Solution
Describe your proposed solution or approach (if applicable).

## Alternatives Considered
List any alternative solutions or approaches you've considered (if applicable).

## Impact
What is the expected impact of this change?

- [ ] High (affects many users or core functionality)
- [ ] Medium (affects some users or specific features)
- [ ] Low (minor improvement or edge case)

## Additional Information
Any additional context, examples, screenshots, or information that can help understand the request better.
